column1: “A butterfly emerging from a caterpillar’s chrysalis.”
“A butterfly’s wings, iridescent and fractal, reflecting a miniature galaxy.”
“A butterfly’s chrysalis, viewed from within, revealing a miniature, swirling cosmos
“A butterfly’s iridescent scales, viewed through a fractal lens, revealing a miniature, pulsating nebula
“A butterfly’s wings, viewed through a fractal kaleidoscope, revealing a miniature, shifting nebula within
